reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Easy to use, well organized. Nice app!!
reviews.author: Michelle Kim

reviews.title: Works excellent.
reviews.comment: It\'s easy to use but still powerful.
reviews.author: Willie Pietersen

reviews.title: no imperial units
reviews.comment: Looks OK, but no explanation of periods or other options, which makes it confusing; units must be metric and there\'s no choice to change to imperial. Needs a lot of work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t use
reviews.comment: No option for imperial units. Bummer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: May I ask??
reviews.comment: How to press the menu button??
reviews.author: Jessica Ong
